ygData.subject: Re: Patch Message
ygData.msgSnippet: Heh, I went to go test these 2 after reading your post.  ER == Elemental Rythmns?  Was thinking oh, good maybe I can melee and have huge MR now if singing
ygData.messageBody:
Heh, I went to go test these 2 after reading your post. ER == Elemental
Rythmns? Was thinking "oh, good maybe I can melee and have huge MR now if
singing this is better than ER and drums..."

But after I get Aura (its Aria is it not?) memmed I realize it's not MR buff
song but the target Cancel Magic debuff. So, I decided to play with it a
bit anyhow.

Like the other debuffs(cancel magic, pilliage enchantment), it agros the
target now.

I attacked some greens in Lavastorm and it seemed to remove their damage
shields. Should try it on some stronger mobs though. Also, would be
interesting to try it on Dragoons. I wonder how they get their insane MR -
do they all have runed bone forks? Or do they have a spell buff on them?
Prolly just insanely high base stats.

Sylly

----- Original Message -----
From: <kim@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Thursday, February 03, 2000 2:37 PM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Patch Message


> From: <kim@...>
>
> On Thu, 3 Feb 2000, Rokenn Swiftsong wrote:
> > *Songs*
> >
> > - Syvelian's Anti-magic Aura: Potency increased.
>
> Whee, a reason to use it instead of ER.
